document.full_text: at least two suspected bomb-makers were killed in a blast in kaduna in northern nigeria on saturday, a city at the center of post-election violence in which hundreds of people are thought to have died this week.
document.title: suspected bomb-makers killed in north nigeria blast
lines_and_colors: at least two suspected bomb-makers were killed in a blast in kaduna in northern nigeria on saturday, a city at the center of post-election violence in which hundreds of people are thought to have died this week.
